resources.string: Don’t have an account yet? Sign up
Already have and account? Sign in
Are you sure you want to logout?
How do I add a new spider to the inventory?
Can I edit the information of a spider after adding it to the inventory?
How can I search for a specific spider in the catalog?
What should I do if I accidentally delete a spider from the inventory?

To add a new spider, navigate to the \'Add Spider\' section from the main menu. Fill in the spider\'s details, such as species, color, origin, and characteristics, then tap \'Save\' to add it to the inventory.
Yes, you can edit spider details. Go to the \'Spider Catalog,\' select the spider you want to update, and tap the \'Edit\' button. Make the necessary changes and save them.
Use the search bar at the top of the \'Spider Catalog\' page to search by species name, color, origin, or other characteristics. You can also use filters to narrow down the results.
Once a spider is deleted, it cannot be recovered. Make sure to confirm your decision when deleting any entry. We recommend double-checking before removing any entry.
